scripts.dev: sh scripts/with-root-env.sh sh -c 'IS_OFFLINE=true SLS_STAGE=local tsx watch src/index.ts'
scripts.dev:local: sh scripts/with-root-env.sh sh -c 'IS_OFFLINE=true SLS_STAGE=local tsx watch src/index.ts'
scripts.local:start: pnpm db:start && sleep 2 && pnpm db:create-tables && pnpm dev:local
scripts.sls:offline: sh scripts/with-root-env.sh sh -c 'pnpm build && IS_OFFLINE=true SLS_STAGE=local serverless offline --stage local'
scripts.sls:deploy: if [ "${MY_TIME_ROOT_DEPLOY:-}" != "1" ]; then echo "Use repository-root deploy command: pnpm run deploy:prod or pnpm run deploy:dev"; exit 1; fi; pnpm build && serverless deploy
